channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Monsoon Sale
channel.desc: Immerse yourself in Monsoon's exclusive SALE hour with up to 50% off! Discover vibrant, bohemian-inspired pieces crafted with unique artisan details.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Transform your wardrobe with up to 50% off in the MarlaWynne Sale at QVC. Discover chic, versatile pieces at amazing prices and elevate your style for less.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Transform your wardrobe with up to 50% off in the MarlaWynne Sale at QVC. Discover chic, versatile pieces at amazing prices and elevate your style for less.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Up-to 50% Off
channel.desc: If you love Ruth Langsford fashion you won't want to miss this. We've got a host of fabulous pieces on offer with savings of up to 50.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Skechers Sale
channel.desc: Explore the Skechers footwear range and discover a variety of on-trend styles and designs that are ideal for wherever your day might take you, plus save up to 50% in our Sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
